name: Supermarket Fever - Girls Game
description:
SuperMarket Fever Grocery Shopping & Cooking Games is a new genre of shopping game where your combine both cooking & serving different items to your customers! You're a coco girl in mall and start to buy ingredients for your pancakes that you'll make! You will start the shopping spree all over the world! From home design items to food and house cleaning items, you will be able to buy them all with your boyfriends credit card!

It is a new type & the best time management game in the coco girls games genre! Try all the new shops & get the best sales at the supermarket & cooking shop! You will need to quickly scan the barcodes of the chocolate, cabbage, carrots or home items and serve your customers the correct items! It is without question the best shopping mall game in 2019! An educational coco game for kids to experience real time shopping for kitchen items, accessories & house cleaning items while managing cash register in the mall! Become a real supermarket manager and treat your clients well!

Features
- 4 shops : Groceries Shop, Chocolate Shop, House Cleaning Shop & Home Decoration Shop
- Over 200+ mall levels!
- 3 game modes: serve all clients, timed level, scan all items level
- Best Time Management Cash Register simulator!
- Best educational kids cashier games 2019!
- Awesome Graphics & Sound Effects!
- Upgraded gameplay from our cooking games winners!
- Top mall cashier game for kids
- Handle cash counter and customer shopping needs
- Sell food, mugs & detergent items to customers.
- Buy food, accessories, pillows, jewelry and more at the mall
- Get sweet cookies in this girl game
- Loved our cooking games? This genre is very similar, but more challenging!
- Collect cash from customers from your sold items!

The First shop in the mall is the Groceries Shop where you will need to serve your clients with delicious fruits, veggies & some tasty milk & food! Serve all your clients otherwise you will lose the level! The women will love this level because of the tasty eggplant, but it's also a very good game for kids games!

The Second Shop is the house cleaning shop where customers come in to purchase window cleaners & detergent! You will serve your clients with toilet odor sprays, toilet paper and liqiud soap for their hands!

The Third Shop is the Choco Store! If you want to enjoy serving top choco or tasty cakes and colorful cookies, then this is your shop! Decorate your choco shop interior with awesome chocolate fountains, lollipops & Caramels! You will have to put the products in some nice boxes so that the users will love their gifts!

The Fourth Shop is the most adored one, it's the Home Deco Shop in which girls & women can purchase fancy products like pillows, towels, candles, dishware & dressing gowns. You will also find in here some nice cutlery, but be careful to serve all your clients!

Play our free mall games & download SuperMarket Fever Grocery Shopping & Cooking Games today!
